front.title: The LLN On-demand Ad hoc Distance-vector Routing Protocol - Next Generation (LOADng)

abstract.t: This document describes the LLN Ad hoc On-Demand - Next Generation (LOADng) distance vector routing protocol, a reactive routing protocol intended for use in Low power and Lossy Networks (LLN). The protocol is derived from AODV (RFC3561) and extended for use in LLNs.
